Emotion.question: The content of my thoughts was:

Realistic.question: I was thinking about an event that has happened or could take place

Words.question: My thoughts were in the form of words

Abstract.question: My thoughts were about ideas rather than events or objects

Creative.question: My thoughts gave me a new insight into something I have thought about before

Decoupling.question: My thoughts dragged my attention away from the external world

Detailed.question: My thoughts were detailed and specific

Temporal D.question: My thoughts were related to:
Temporal D.scale: The here and now                            A more distant time

Important.question: My thoughts were on topics that I care about

Stop.question: My thoughts were hard for me to stop

Vivid.question: My thoughts were vivid as if I was there

Thematic.question: My thoughts at different points in time were all on the same theme

Evolving.question: My thoughts tended to evolve in a series of steps

Problem.question: I was thinking about solutions to problems (or goals)

Images.question: My thoughts were in the form of images

Habit.question: This thought has recurrent themes similar to those I have had before
